data.title: Buy GG Allin & The Jabbers : Bored To Death Vinyl Online from Sit and Spin Records for a great price
data.meta_description: GG Allin & The Jabbers : Bored To Death Vinyl is available for sale at Sit and Spin Records for a great price. We buy and sell Vinyl, CDs, Cassettes & band merch. Specializing in punk, hardcore, rock, metal & more.
data.text:
Media Condition: Near Mint (NM or M-)

Sleeve Condition: Near Mint (NM or M-)

new copy

*The photos shown here are stock photos provided as reference and do not reflect the condition of the item we have in stock.

Label: Blood Orange Records - BOR1980-05

Format: 7", Ltd, RE, RM

Country: US

Released: 2021

Notes:

The first and only official reissue of this 1979 classic. Remastered and including a never before released live version of Beat Beat Beat from GG & the Jabbers first tour ever in Spring 1980. Comes with 2 double sided inserts: one is the very first GG & the Jabbers 8.5 x 14 poster/hype sheet and the other a color liner - info sheet check full of facts, info and rare pics. Limited to 500 on black vinyl (This!) + 500 on pink vinyl.

Track List:

. Birth Side

A1. Bored To Death 1:57

A2. Beat, Beat, Beat 1:57

. Death Side

B1. One Man Army 2:12

B2. Beat, Beat, Beat (Live) 2:00

Barcode and Other Identifiers:

Recorded At Dancing Moose Studio

Bass - Merle Allin

Drums, Vocals, Producer - GG Allin

Engineer - John Stewart (6)

Guitar [Uncredited] - Peter Henault

Photography By - Suzi Chaser

Producer [Associate] - Joel Raymond

Producer [Associate] - Peter Suyama

Data provided by Discogs
